verses.t: Paul{G3972}, an apostle{G652} of Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} by{G1223} the will{G2307} of God{G2316}, according to{G2596} the promise{G1860} of life{G2222} which is{G3588} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424},

To Timothy{G5095}, my dearly beloved{G27} son{G5043}: Grace{G5485}, mercy{G1656}, and peace{G1515}, from{G575} God{G2316} the Father{G3962} and{G2532} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424} our{G2257} Lord{G3588}.

I{G2192} thank{G5485} God{G3588}, whom{G3739} I serve{G3000} from{G575} my forefathers{G4269} with{G1722} pure{G2513} conscience{G4893}, that{G5613} without ceasing{G88} I have{G2192} remembrance{G3417} of{G4012} thee{G4675} in{G1722} my{G3450} prayers{G3588} night{G3571} and{G2532} day{G2250};
Greatly desiring{G1971} to see{G1492} thee{G4571}, being mindful{G3415} of thy{G4675} tears{G3588}, that{G2443} I may be filled{G4137} with joy{G5479};

When I call{G2983} to remembrance{G5280} the unfeigned{G505} faith{G4102} that is{G3588} in{G1722} thee{G4671}, which{G3748} dwelt{G1774} first{G4412} in{G1722} thy{G4675} grandmother{G3588} Lois{G3090}, and{G2532} thy{G4675} mother{G3588} Eunice{G2131}; and{G1161} I am persuaded{G3982} that{G3754} in{G1722} thee{G4671} also{G2532}.

Wherefore{G1223} I put{G363} thee{G4571} in remembrance{G363} that thou stir up{G329} the gift{G3588} of God{G3588}, which{G3739} is{G2076} in{G1722} thee{G4671} by{G1223} the putting on{G3588} of my{G3450} hands{G3588}.I tagged "wherefore" with DI' since only one word can be tagged.
For{G1063} God{G3588} hath{G1325} not{G3756} given{G1325} us{G2254} the spirit{G4151} of fear{G1167}; but{G235} of power{G1411}, and{G2532} of love{G26}, and{G2532} of a sound mind{G4995}.

Be not{G3361} thou{G1870} therefore{G3767} ashamed of{G1870}the testimony{G3588} of our{G2257} Lord{G3588}, nor{G3366} of me{G1691} his{G846} prisoner{G3588}: but{G235} be thou partaker of the afflictions{G4777} of the gospel{G3588} according to{G2596} the power{G1411} of God{G2316};

Who hath saved{G4982} us{G2248}, and{G2532} called{G2564} us with an holy{G40} calling{G2821}, not{G3756} according to{G2596} our{G2257} works{G3588}, but{G235} according to{G2596} his own{G2398} purpose{G4286} and{G2532} grace{G5485}, which was given{G1325} us{G2254} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424} before{G4253} the world{G5550} began{G166},

But{G1161} is{G5319} now{G3568} made manifest{G5319} by{G1223} the appearing{G3588} of our{G2257} Saviour{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, who hath abolished{G2673} death{G3588}, and{G1161} hath brought{G5461} life{G2222} and{G2532} immortality{G861} to light{G5461} through{G1223} the gospel{G3588}:
Where{G3739}unto{G1519} I{G1473} am appointed{G5087} a preacher{G2783}, and{G2532} an apostle{G652}, and{G2532} a teacher{G1320} of the Gentiles{G1484}.

For{G1223} the which{G3739} cause I{G3958} also{G2532} suffer these things{G5023}: nevertheless{G235} I am{G1870} not{G3756} ashamed{G1870}: for{G1063} I know{G1492} whom{G3739} I have believed{G4100}, and{G2532} am persuaded{G3982} that{G3754} he is{G2076} able{G1415} to keep{G5442} that which{G3588} I{G3450} have committed{G3866} unto him against{G1519} that{G1565} day{G3588}."unto him" is not tagged because there really is no element in the Greek that it can legitimately be attributed.

Hold fast{G2192} the form{G5296} of sound{G5198} words{G3056}, which{G3739} thou hast heard{G191} of{G3844} me{G1700}, in{G1722} faith{G4102} and{G2532} love{G26} which is{G3588} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}.
That{G3588} good thing{G2570} which was committed unto thee{G3872} keep{G5442} by{G1223} the Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151} which dwelleth{G1774} in{G1722} us{G2254}.

This{G5124} thou knowest{G1492}, that{G3754} all{G3956} they which are{G3588} in{G1722} Asia{G3588} be turned away from{G654} me{G3165}; of whom{G3739} are{G2076} Phygellus{G5436} and{G2532} Hermogenes{G2061}.

The Lord{G3588} give{G1325} mercy{G1656} unto the house{G3624} of Onesiphorus{G3683}; for{G3754} he{G404} oft{G4178} refreshed{G404} me{G3165}, and{G2532} was{G1870} not{G3756} ashamed{G1870} of my{G3450} chain{G3588}:
But{G235}, when he was{G1096} in{G1722} Rome{G4516}, he sought{G2212} me{G3165} out{G2212} very diligently{G4706}, and{G2532} found{G2147} me.

The Lord{G3588} grant{G1325} unto him{G846} that he may find{G2147} mercy{G1656} of{G3844} the Lord{G2962} in{G1722} that{G1565} day{G3588}: and{G2532} in how many things{G3745} he ministered{G1247} unto me at{G1722} Ephesus{G2181}, thou{G4771} knowest{G1097} very well{G957}.
